alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 07 at 8:57PM EDT until August 09 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Estill and Powell. In southeast Kentucky, Lee and Wolfe. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 854 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated that heavy rainfall had exited the area; however, excessive runoff from previous heavy rainfall will continue to cause high water along small streams and creeks through 10 pm. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Campton, Fincastle, Fixer, Zoe, Zachariah, Leeco, Standing Rock, Greeley, Whisman, Torrent, Mount Olive, Booth, See, Whynot, Pilot, Rogers, Patsey, Old Landing, Crystal and Grannie.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
